description: "It is an aural punch in the gut, delivered with a velvet glove. The raw power of Sarvjeet Tamta's vocals makes one shake one's head in wonder and then shake it many more times with the sheer joy that infuses the music. It is not easy to resist the magnetic charm, the sheer power of the music that comes from the very depths of their hearts and reaches the very depths of the listeners' as well." - Sarthak Kaushik, 104.6FM.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: Rehmat-e-Nusrat

performer.description: Formed by lead vocalist & harmonium virtuoso Sarvjeet Tamta, Rehmat-e-Nusrat brings a fresh new perspective to the timeless tradition of qawwali music. These young musicians perform original compositions and qawwalis, Sufiyana kalaams by great poets, and Kabir bhajans.
performer.name: Rehmat-e-Nusrat

description: Her audience is taken on a journey through different sounds and environments such as Fado and traditional Portuguese music, in an interpretation that is intense and dynamic yet guided by sensitivity and delicacy, and with a very Portuguese flavour and identity. The strings of her guitar explore new sounds and musical genres such as jazz, world music and Portuguese music, but always with the fundamental authenticity of Fado.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: Marta Pereira Da Costa

performer.description: Marta Pereira da Costa is a pioneer in professionally playing Portuguese guitar in Fado across the world. In a territory historically occupied by men, she made this instrument hers, and brought it to the forefront of music.
performer.name: Marta Pereira Da Costa

description: Together, they form The Next Dimension, a power trio set to captivate audiences with their debut project. With their extensive global performance experience and unique musical talents, they offer a seamless fusion of jazz sophistication, world influences, and dynamic rock energy, creating a captivating and innovative sound.

address.streetAddress: Windmills IMAGINE, No. 78, ITPL Main Road, EPIP Zone,Bangalore

name: The Next Dimension

performer.description: For over 15 years, they have been the signature sound behind John McLaughlin’s electric band, 'The 4th Dimension.' Now, the irrepressible drummer and composer Ranjit Barot, the legendary drummer, composer, and keyboard player Gary Husband, and the inimitable bass player and composer Etienne Mbappé are embarking on an exciting new journey.
performer.name: The Next Dimension
